Problems:

*1. Spam Traffic & Form Fill Issues*
• Sudden spike in *spam demo requests* and *fake calendar bookings*, possibly due to *competitor activity*.
• Sales team is frustrated due to time wasted on unqualified/fake leads.
• Developer (Deepak) added basic protections (IP block, possibly CAPTCHA), but spam persists.
• Need help *diagnosing source and nature* of spam traffic and implementing *robust bot/spam filtering*.
:dart: *2. Audience Targeting Issues*
• Website is receiving *consumer (B2C) traffic* from people looking for dental implants.
• Product is strictly *B2B* — targeted at *dentists*, not end patients.
• Ad targeting, landing page messaging, or SEO may be attracting the wrong audience.
:chart_with_downwards_trend: *3. Polluted Tracking & Pixel Data*
• *Facebook Pixel is polluted* with bad traffic, making *retargeting ineffective*.
• Need to *start fresh with a new pixel* and *only track qualified leads*.
• Consider *CAPI (Conversions API)* implementation to send high-quality signals.
• Potential solution: *Send purchase/subscribe events only for qualified leads.*
:arrows_counterclockwise: *4. Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)*
• Need to *audit funnel* and suggest improvements to:
• Reduce friction for dentists (real leads).
• Filter out irrelevant leads early in the process.
• Improve messaging and targeting for dentists.
